Package org.blockchainnative.builder

Class MethodInfoBuilder<TSelf extends MethodInfoBuilder<TSelf,TMethodInfo,TContractInfoBuilder,TParameterInfoBuilder>,TMethodInfo extends MethodInfo,TContractInfoBuilder extends ContractInfoBuilder,TParameterInfoBuilder extends ParameterInfoBuilder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.blockchainnative.builder.MethodInfoBuilder<TSelf,TMethodInfo,TContractInfoBuilder,TParameterInfoBuilder>
  • Type Parameters:
    TSelf - Concrete type of the MethodInfoBuilder
    TMethodInfo - Concrete type of the MethodInfo to be created
    TContractInfoBuilder - Concrete type of the ContractInfoBuilder used by this builder
    TParameterInfoBuilder - Concrete type of the ParameterInfoBuilder used by this builder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EthereumContractInfoBuilder.EthereumMethodInfoBuilder, FabricContractInfoBuilder.FabricMethodInfoBuilder
    public abstract class MethodInfoBuilder<TSelf extends MethodInfoBuilder<TSelf,TMethodInfo,TContractInfoBuilder,TParameterInfoBuilder>,TMethodInfo extends MethodInfo,TContractInfoBuilder extends ContractInfoBuilder,TParameterInfoBuilder extends ParameterInfoBuilder>
extends java.lang.Object
    Fluent API to build MethodInfo objects.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    ContractInfo, MethodInfo, MethodInfoBuilder, ParameterInfoBuilder, EventInfoBuilder, EventParameterInfoBuilder, EventFieldInfoBuilder

    • Method Detail

      • name

        public TSelf name​(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name of the smart contract method targeted by this MethodInfo.
        Initial value is taken from ContractMethod.value()
        Parameters:
        name - name of the smart contract method targeted by this MethodInfo
        Returns:
        MethodInfoBuilder

      • readonly

        public TSelf readonly​(boolean isReadOnly)
        Controls whether or not the smart contract method targeted by this MethodInfo should be called without modifying the blockchain state.
        Initial value is taken from ContractMethod.isReadOnly()
        Parameters:
        isReadOnly - flag indicating whether or not the smart contract method targeted by this MethodInfo should be called without modifying the blockchain state.
        Returns:
        MethodInfoBuilder

      • useResultTypeConverter

        public TSelf useResultTypeConverter​(java.lang.Class<? extends TypeConverter<?,?>> typeConverterClass)
        Sets the TypeConverter to be used to convert the smart contracts result to the method's declared return type.
        Initial value is taken from ContractMethod.useTypeConverter()
        Parameters:
        typeConverterClass - class of the TypeConverter to be used to convert the smart contract's result
        Returns:
        MethodInfoBuilder

      • specialMethod

        public TSelf specialMethod​(boolean isSpecialMethod)
        Controls whether or not the method targeted by this MethodInfo is marked as special method to the underlying provider.
        How this method is interpreted is up to provider.
        Initial value is taken from ContractMethod.isSpecialMethod()
        Parameters:
        isSpecialMethod - flag indicating whether or not the method targeted by this MethodInfo is marked as special method
        Returns:
        MethodInfoBuilder

      • self

        protected TSelf self()
        Returns itself as the generic parameter TSelf.
        Allows sub types of MethodInfoBuilder to return the correct type from the fluent methods like name(String).
        Returns:
        this casted to TSelf

      • parameter

        public TParameterInfoBuilder parameter​(java.lang.reflect.Parameter parameter)
        Creates or returns a preexisting ParameterInfoBuilder for a parameter of the contract method targeted by this MethodInfo
        Parameters:
        parameter - parameter of the method targeted by this MethodInfo
        Returns:
        ParameterInfoBuilder for the specified parameter
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in case the parameter could not be found on the targeted method.

      • parameter

        public TParameterInfoBuilder parameter​(int i)
        Creates or returns a preexisting ParameterInfoBuilder for a parameter of the contract method targeted by this MethodInfo
        Parameters:
        i - index of a parameter of the method targeted by this MethodInfo
        Returns:
        ParameterInfoBuilder for the specified parameter
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in case the parameter could not be found on the targeted method.

      • getMethodInfo

        public TMethodInfo getMethodInfo()
        Returns the MethodInfo object declared through the fluent API.
        Must only be called after build().
        Returns:
        MethodInfo object represented by the builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - in case the build() has not been called before.

      • hasBeenBuilt

        public boolean hasBeenBuilt()
        Returns if the MethodInfo object represented by the builder has already been built or not.
        Returns:
        boolean value indicating if the MethodInfo object represented by the builder has already been built or not

      • build

        public final TContractInfoBuilder build()
        Creates the MethodInfo object declared through the fluent API.
        Must only be called once.
        Returns:
        MethodInfo object represented by the builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - in case the build() has been called before.

        Returns:
